definitions.text: the distinct personality of an individual regarded as a persisting entity
examples: you can lose your identity when you join the army

definitions.text: the individual characteristics by which a thing or person is recognized or known
examples: geneticists only recently discovered the identity of the gene that causes it
it was too dark to determine his identity
she guessed the identity of his lover

definitions.text: an operator that leaves unchanged the element on which it operates
examples: the identity under numerical multiplication is 1
they shared an identity of interests
